org.iotivity.base

Class OcHeaderOption

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.iotivity.base.OcHeaderOption

  • public class OcHeaderOption
extends java.lang.Object
    OcHeaderOption class allows to create instances which comprises optionId and optionData as members. These are used in setting Header options. After creating instances of OcHeaderOptions, use setHeaderOptions API (in OcResource) to set header Options. NOTE: optionId is an integer value which MUST be within range of 2048 to 3000 inclusive of lower and upper bound except for a few options including If-Match with empty(num : 1), If-None-Match(num : 5), Location-Path(num : 8), Location-Query(num : 20) CoAP option. HeaderOption instance creation fails if above condition is not satisfied.
